scripts.nocode-build: cd ./apps/nocode && npm run build && cd ../../ && mkdir ./dist/nocode && mv ./apps/nocode/build/* ./dist/nocode/
scripts.proximity-build: cd ./apps/proximity && npm run build && cd ../../ && mkdir ./dist/proximity && mv ./apps/proximity/build/* ./dist/proximity/
scripts.start-build: npm run clean && mkdir ./dist && concurrently "npm run nocode-build"  "npm run proximity-build"
